document_data.name: Urmon
document_data.mainbody: '''Urmon''' was an adventurer and lore enthusiast.
document_data.Description: Urmon kept a journal where they noted down the history of the [[Wave Echo Cave|Lost Mine of Phandelver]], and the [[Forge of Spells]]. Their journal also recorded that an enchanted [[mace]] called ''[[Lightbringer]]'', which was made in the mine for a [[cleric]] of [[Lathander]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1491 DR]],{{Phandelver-time}} [[Iarno Albrek]] came to own Urmon's journal, and it was placed in his workshop in [[Phandalin]]. The book detailed the history of the Wave Echo Cave and related topics.
